pages.title: Locked Vanishing Block
pages.text: There's something not right with this thing. No matter what I do to it, nothing happens to it, and neither do the connected Vanishing Blocks. I noticed this strange shape in the center of this device, perhaps it needs a key of some sort?

Of course, these devices are like locks to doors. If I give one of these a Tower Key, they will be unlocked, and thus interacting with one will cause them to vanish before me, and allow neighboring Vanishing Blocks to disappear.
